page.title: 09RECREATION CENTRE--A VISIT
page.content: Every year just before the summer holidays we always go on a school trip. This year we asked our teacher if,instead of going away on a bus when it might be raining,we could go for our outing to the {Templemore Sports {Complex.}Unfortunately,because of the Council having to make cuts in spending the Sports Complex does not open in the mornings so our trip was only a half-day.We had the choice of swimming,or indoor games,or outdoor games.Some of us went outdoors first but we only played on the swings and slides and climbing frames.then it started to rain.We went into the sports hall and we played football or table-tennis or badminton or netball for quite a while and then it was time for our swim.There were other people there but we all enjoyed our swim even those who had begun to swim this year.
